document.full_text: military prosecutors on tuesday charged a sixth u.s. soldier with direct involvement in the murder of unarmed afghan civilians, implicating a sergeant who was referred earlier for court-martial on lesser offenses.
document.title: sixth u.s. soldier implicated in murder of afghans
lines_and_colors: military prosecutors on tuesday charged a sixth u.s. soldier with direct involvement in the murder of unarmed afghan civilians, implicating a sergeant who was referred earlier for court-martial on lesser offenses.
